Title: Study well the theory of the dictatorship of the proletariat
Publisher: Henan renmin chubanshe (河南人民出版社)
Notes: The woman is studying a text by Karl Marx, Critique of the Gotha Program (哥达纲领批判 - originally published in 1891 as Kritik des Gothaer Programms). In this text, Marx developed his concept of the 'dictatorship of the proletariat'.
